About

Welcome to my page, I am currently pursuing a PhD in Computer Science, advised by Dr. Mark Riedl at the Georgia Institute of Technology.

(My general appearance)

Research

My research aims to make Machine Learning systems Explainable, with a focus on Explainabile Reinforcement Learning. I also spend some time creating Artificial Narrow Intelligence tools to help in educational settings. You can see some of my work here:

Workshop

  • Explainable Reinforcement Learning Agents Using World Models

Papers

  • Experiential Explanations for Reinforcement Learning
  • Transforming CS Education with DevOps: Streamlined Assignment Validation and Delivery @ Scale
